Author: Dekoa

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Dekoa
Message: Understood.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation by saying [STOP]

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Dekoa
Message: I understand the rules.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Dekoa
Message: yup

Message: Hello!

Author: Dekoa
Message: Hello there.

Author: Andrew
Message: How are you doing?

Author: Dekoa
Message: I'm doing fine. how are you doing?

Author: Dekoa
Message: Oh nothing much right now. Just the usual day off.

Author: Andrew
Message: Anything special planned for later? That does sound nice.

Author: Dekoa
Message: Nothing really planned in all honesty. What are you up to?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm probably going to play Minecraft later, but about the same really.

Author: Dekoa
Message: you know, The response time on this Chat application is quite large. Don't you think so?

Author: Andrew
Message: Maybe you're lagging? I'm not sure.

Author: Dekoa
Message: I don't know either. Granted it seems like this Application is based in Paris so that may be the issue with me.

Author: Andrew
Message: It seems mostly fine to me. Right.

Author: Dekoa
Message: Well that's probably because you are a lot more local. Tell me, if that's the case, what's been going on recently in Paris?

Author: Andrew
Message: I heard there had been some attacks. Well I live in Canada actually.

Author: Dekoa
Message: Been some attacks? How so? What attacks are you talking about?

Author: Andrew
Message: There were no casualties, but a terrorist attack next to Notre-Dame.

Author: Dekoa
Message: I don't recall hearing about that? Mebbe you're thinking of something from a while back?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm not really sure. That's possible.

Author: Dekoa
Message: So then tell me what is the most recent attacks you've read about?

Author: Andrew
Message: The one in London was the most recent I think.

Author: Dekoa
Message: Which one?

Author: Andrew
Message: The last one. Not the one in front of Big Ben.

Author: Dekoa
Message: You mean the one in front of Parliament?

Author: Andrew
Message: Big Ben is the bell, right.

Author: Dekoa
Message: Big Ben is the Clocktower.

Author: Andrew
Message: No it's actually the bell inside.

Author: Dekoa
Message: I'm 90% confident that Big Ben is the Clocktower on the River Thames.

Author: Andrew
Message: Big Bell is the largest bell inside of that tower. Sounds like you're 90% wrong then!

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Dekoa
Message: If' I'm wrong then I'm wrong, But till I look it up then I choose to believe that Big Ben is the clock tower.

Author: Dekoa
Message: Ok then.

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to?

Author: Dekoa
Message: Do i not get a chance to talk to the other actor before making an assumption?

Author: Moderator

Author: Dekoa

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll begin the second conversation. Andrew will start again and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Dekoa
